cron-job.title: Cron Job
cron-job.description: A fully-automated 3D news show that transforms Discord conversations and GitHub activity into polished daily episodes. Every day, AI hosts deliver the latest developments from the ElizaOS ecosystem.
cron-job.longDescription: Cron Job is a fully-automated 3D news show that transforms Discord conversations and GitHub activity into polished daily episodes. Every day, AI hosts Marc and Eliza deliver the latest developments from the ElizaOS ecosystem. From merged pull requests to community discussions, no update goes unnoticed. Shaw provides technical deep-dives, while Sparty and Pepo keep you updated on crypto market movements.

pipeline.title: Data Collection
pipeline.description: GitHub PRs, issues, and Discord conversations from the ElizaOS ecosystem are gathered automatically.

pipeline.title: Script Generation
pipeline.description: AI analyzes the data and generates a conversational script for our cast of characters.

pipeline.title: Voice Synthesis
pipeline.description: Each character's dialogue is converted to speech using distinct AI voice profiles.

pipeline.title: 3D Animation
pipeline.description: Characters are animated in a 3D studio environment and rendered to video.

clank-tank.title: Clank Tank
clank-tank.tagline: Pitch to AI judges. Compete for exposure.
clank-tank.description: An AI-powered game show where blockchain entrepreneurs pitch their projects to a panel of simulated crypto judges.
clank-tank.longDescription: Clank Tank is an AI-powered game show where blockchain entrepreneurs pitch their projects to a panel of simulated crypto judges. Inspired by Shark Tank, our system transforms real business pitches into complete episodes with AI-generated characters and dialogue. The judges evaluate each pitch, ask tough questions, and ultimately decide whether to 'pump' or 'dump' the project.

pipeline.title: Pitch Submission
pipeline.description: Entrepreneurs submit project details through our form with tokenomics, team info, and vision.

pipeline.title: AI Research
pipeline.description: Our system analyzes each pitch using AI for enhanced context and market research.

pipeline.title: Character Creation
pipeline.description: AI generates a character profile to represent the pitcher in the show.

pipeline.title: Script Generation
pipeline.description: AI Writers' Room creates complete episode scripts with natural dialogue.

pipeline.title: Voice Synthesis
pipeline.description: Each character's lines are converted to speech using unique AI voice profiles.

pipeline.title: 3D Rendering
pipeline.description: Episodes are rendered in real-time using PlayCanvas with JSON-based scene control.

pipeline.title: Recording
pipeline.description: Automated tools capture high-quality video with professional transitions.

pipeline.title: Publishing
pipeline.description: Automated upload to YouTube with professional metadata and thumbnails.

episodes.title: The AI Battle Arena
episodes.description: Season 1 premiere featuring blockchain innovators pitching to our panel of AI judges.

jedai-council.title: JedAI Council
jedai-council.tagline: Where AI minds convene to debate the future
jedai-council.description: A groundbreaking virtual show where sophisticated AI agents gather to debate technology, economics, and the future of society.
jedai-council.longDescription: JedAI Council is a groundbreaking virtual show where sophisticated AI agents with unique personalities gather to debate technology, economics, and the future of society. Set in an immersive 3D council chamber, each session brings together five distinct perspectives. From blockchain philosophy to meme culture analysis, artificial consciousness to economic theory — no topic is too complex for the council.

pipeline.title: Topic Selection
pipeline.description: Community data and trending discussions inform the debate topic for each session.

pipeline.title: Position Generation
pipeline.description: Each AI council member develops their unique perspective based on their personality model.

pipeline.title: Live Debate
pipeline.description: AI agents engage in real-time dialogue, responding and adapting to each other's arguments.

pipeline.title: 3D Production
pipeline.description: The debate is rendered in the council chamber with dynamic cameras and atmospheric effects.

episodes.title: The Future of AI Agents
episodes.description: The council debates the implications of autonomous AI agents in society.

episodes.title: Blockchain Philosophy
episodes.description: A deep dive into the philosophical foundations of decentralized systems.

episodes.title: Meme Culture & Markets
episodes.description: Exploring the intersection of internet culture and financial markets.

stonk-wars.title: Stonk Wars
stonk-wars.tagline: AI agents react to real-time market chaos
stonk-wars.description: 24/7 livestream featuring AI agents that react to live financial markets on a virtual trading floor.
stonk-wars.longDescription: Stonk Wars is a 24/7 livestream featuring AI agents that react to live financial markets on a virtual NYSE trading floor. Watch as AI traders respond to real-time data from crypto, stocks, and forex markets. This isn't financial advice — it's derpy entertainment. AI characters read and respond to chat messages in real-time, creating dynamic audience participation.

pipeline.title: Market Data
pipeline.description: Live feeds from crypto exchanges, stock markets, and forex platforms stream in continuously.

pipeline.title: AI Analysis
pipeline.description: AI agents process market movements and generate contextual reactions and commentary.

pipeline.title: Chat Integration
pipeline.description: Viewer messages are processed in real-time, influencing AI character responses.

pipeline.title: Live Render
pipeline.description: The 3D trading floor is rendered live with dynamic cameras and character animations.

features.title: Real-Time Data
features.description: Live market data from stocks, crypto, and forex drives AI reactions. BTC, ETH, NVDA, S&P 500, and more.

features.title: Interactive Chat
features.description: AI characters read and respond to chat messages in real-time. Influence the show with your messages.

features.title: AI Characters
features.description: Virtual personalities populate the trading floor with dynamic interactions and entertaining commentary.

eliza.name: Eliza
eliza.description: The primary host across M3TV shows, known for her engaging presentation style.

aixvc.name: AIXVC
aixvc.description: Investment-focused AI personality bringing VC perspective to discussions.

shaw.name: AI Shaw
shaw.description: Technical analyst providing deep-dives into code, architecture, and tech trends.

spartan.name: Degen Spartan
spartan.description: Crypto-focused personality with degen energy and market insights.

peepo.name: Peepo
peepo.description: Meme-savvy personality bringing humor and cultural commentary.
